creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: This drawing is about empathy. Whether you see the drops surrounding the eye as rain, or as grief shared by others: Justice and healing flows from the community, and Justice is the rain that cleanses and nurtures.
title: August 27, 2020: INJUSTICE. IN JUSTICE.
